name: Scary Jason 3D: Horror Scream
description:
Welcome to Scary Jason 3D: Horror Scream! Which is processed a scary Jason. No one has won from her because know tricks to kidnap the people. Whole building is so scary and mysterious the lights automatic on off at a time. Scram and spooky sounds hear in mid night.

Alert! You're here to save people from the scary character who kidnapped them from many years. You have escape from him all the people safely. The mission of Jason is to cheat the people and grab them in their building.It's said last year the horror sounds hears the neighbors. They leave their houses from the fear of ghost. They think that scary character is expert in black magic.

Your aim is to release these souls and save the alive kids in evil Horror Scream game. Be careful when anyone enter in building he killed them. Now your utmost duty is save them without any threatening.
